mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.project_code AS "projectCode", a.project_name AS "projectName", a.address AS "address", a.kind AS "kind.id", a.heat_area AS "heatArea", a.heat_days AS "heatDays", a.price AS "price", a.project_start AS "projectStart", a.startup_date AS "startupDate", a.construct_period AS "constructPeriod", a.product_date AS "productDate", a.countyears AS "countyears", a.deptid AS "office.id", a.pk_corp AS "pkCorp", b.name AS "kind.name", office.name AS "office.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_project_b( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, project_code, project_name, address, kind, heat_area, heat_days, price, project_start, startup_date, construct_period, product_date, countyears, deptid, pk_corp ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{projectCode}, #{projectName}, #{address}, #{kind.id}, #{heatArea}, #{heatDays}, #{price}, #{projectStart}, #{startupDate}, #{constructPeriod}, #{productDate}, #{countyears}, #{office.id}, #{pkCorp} )
